DOMANDA1.LABEL: Participation in a criminal organisation
DOMANDA1.DESCRIZIONE: Participation in a criminal organisation, as defined in Article 2 of Council Framework Decision 2008/841/JHA of 24 October 2008 on the fight against organised crime
DOMANDA1.DESCRIZIONE_SUB: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 50/2016 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes committed or attempted referred to in Article 416, 416-bis of the Penal Code or for crimes committed using the conditions set out in the Article 416-bis or in order to facilitate the activity of the associations provided for by the same article, as well as for crimes, committed or attempted, provided for by Article 74 of Decree of the President of the Republic No. 309/1990, by Article 291-quater of the Decree of the President of the Republic No. 43/1973 and Article 260 of Legislative Decree No. 152/2006, relating to participation in a criminal organisation as defined in Article 2 of Council Framework Decision 2008/841/JHA? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 50/2016 has ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

DOMANDA2.LABEL: Corruption
DOMANDA2.DESCRIZIONE: Corruption, as defined in Article 3 of the Convention on the fight against corruption involving officials of the European Communities or officials of Member States of the European Union, OJ C 195, 25.6.1997, and in Article 2(1) of Council Framework Decision 2003/568/JHA of 22 July 2003 on combating corruption in the private sector (OJ L 192, 31.7.2003). This exclusion ground also includes corruption as defined in the national law of the contracting authority (contracting entity) or the economic operator
DOMANDA2.DESCRIZIONE_SUB: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 50/2016 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes committed or attempted referred to in Articles 317, 318, 319, 319-ter, 319-quater, 320, 321, 322, 322-bis, 346-bis, 353, 353-bis, 354, 355 e 356 of the Penal Code or in Article 2635 of the Civil Code? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 50/2016 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

DOMANDA3.LABEL: Fraud
DOMANDA3.DESCRIZIONE: Fraud within the meaning of Article 1 of the Convention on the protection of the European Communities' financial interests (OJ C 316, 27.11.1995)
DOMANDA3.DESCRIZIONE_SUB: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 50/2016 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for froud crime as defined in Article 1 of the Convention on the protection of the European Communities' financial interests? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 50/2016 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

DOMANDA4.LABEL: Terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities
DOMANDA4.DESCRIZIONE: Terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities, as defined in Articles 1 and 3 of Council Framework Decision of 13 June 2002 on combating terrorism (OJ L 164, 22.6.2002). This exclusion ground also includes inciting or aiding or abetting or attempting to commit an offence, as referred to in Article 4 of that Framework Decision
DOMANDA4.DESCRIZIONE_SUB: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 50/2016 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes, committed or attempted, in connection with terrorism, even internationally, or subversion of constitutional order, terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 50/2016 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

DOMANDA5.LABEL: Money laundering or terrorist financing
DOMANDA5.DESCRIZIONE: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgement for money laundering or terrorist financing, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Article 1 of Directive 2005/60/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 October 2005 on the prevention of the use of the financial system for the purpose of money laundering and terrorist financing (OJ L 309, 25.11.2005, p. 15)
DOMANDA5.DESCRIZIONE_SUB: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 50/2016 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuanto to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes as defined in Article 648-bis, 648-ter e 648-ter.1 of the Penal Code, money laundering or terrorist financing, as defined in Article 1 of Legislative Decree No. 109/2007? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 50/2016 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

DOMANDA6.LABEL: Child labour and other forms of trafficking in human beings
DOMANDA6.DESCRIZIONE: Money laundering or terrorist financing, as defined in Article 2 of Directive 2011/36/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 5 April 2011 on preventing and combating trafficking in human beings and protecting its victims, and replacing Council Framework Decision 2002/629/JHA (OJ L 101, 15.4.2011)
DOMANDA6.DESCRIZIONE_SUB: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 50/2016 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes of exploitation of child labor and other forms of trafficking in human beings defined by the Legislative Decree n. 24/2014? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 50/2016 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

DOMANDA22.LABEL: Early termination, damages or other comparable sanctions
DOMANDA22.DESCRIZIONE: Has the economic operator experienced that a prior public contract, a prior contract with a contracting entity or a prior concession contract was terminated early, or that damages or other comparable sanctions were imposed in connection with that prior contract?

DOMANDA23.LABEL: Guilty of misinterpretation, withheld information, unable to provide required documents and obtained confidential information of this procedure
DOMANDA23.DESCRIZIONE:
Can the economic operator confirm that: a) It has been guilty of serious misrepresentation in supplying the information required for the verification of the absence of grounds for exclusion or the fulfilment of the selection criteria, 
 b) It has withheld such information,
 c) It has not been able, without delay, to submit the supporting documents required by a contracting authority or contracting entity;
 d) It has undertaken to unduly influence the decision making process of the contracting authority or contracting entity, to obtain confidential information that may confer upon it undue advantages in the procurement procedure or to negligently provide misleading information that may have a material influence on decisions concerning exclusion, selection or award?

DOMANDA24.LABEL: Purely national exclusion grounds
DOMANDA24.DESCRIZIONE: Do the purely national grounds of exclusion, which are specified in the relevant notice or in the procurement documents, apply?
DOMANDA24.DOMANDA1: False corporate communications - The subjects of the economic operator listed in art. 80, co. 3, of the legislative decree n. 50/2016 were sentenced with a definitive sentence or criminal decree of conviction that has become irrevocable or sentence applying the penalty upon request pursuant to article 444 of the Criminal Procedure Code for the crimes of false corporate communications referred to in articles 2621 and 2622 of Civil Code? The economic operator is not required to declare the sentence if: the exclusion period established by the sentence or decree or provided for by art. 80, co. 10 and 10-bis of Legislative Decree no. 50/2016; the offense was decriminalized; rehabilitation took place; the perpetual accessory penalty has been declared extinct pursuant to Article 179, seventh paragraph, of the Criminal Code; the offense was declared extinct after the conviction; the sentence was revoked. (Article 80, paragraph 1, letter b-bis), Legislative Decree no. 50/2016) Convictions involving prohibitions on contracting with the public administration - The subjects of the economic operator listed in art. 80, co. 3, of the legislative decree n. 50/2016 were sentenced with a definitive sentence or criminal decree which has become irrevocable or sentence applying the penalty upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure for any other crime from which, as an ancillary penalty, the incapacity to negotiate with the public administration? The economic operator is not required to declare the sentence if: the exclusion period established by the sentence or decree has ended; the offense was decriminalized; rehabilitation took place; the perpetual accessory penalty has been declared extinct pursuant to Article 179, seventh paragraph, of the Criminal Code; the offense was declared extinct after the conviction; the sentence was revoked. (Article 80, paragraph 1, letter g), Legislative Decree no. 50/2016)

CRIMINAL-CONVICTIONS.TITLE: Participation in a criminal organisation
CRIMINAL-CONVICTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Participation in a criminal organisation, as defined in Article 2 of Council Framework Decision 2008/841/JHA of 24 October 2008 on the fight against organised crime
CRIMINAL-CONVICTIONS.SUB-DESCRIPTION: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 36/2023 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes committed or attempted referred to in Article 416, 416-bis of the Penal Code or for crimes committed using the conditions set out in the Article 416-bis or in order to facilitate the activity of the associations provided for by the same article, as well as for crimes, committed or attempted, provided for by Article 74 of Decree of the President of the Republic No. 309/1990, by Article 291-quater of the Decree of the President of the Republic No. 43/1973 and Article 260 of Legislative Decree No. 152/2006, relating to participation in a criminal organisation as defined in Article 2 of Council Framework Decision 2008/841/JHA? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 36/2023 has ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

CORRUPTION.TITLE: Corruption
CORRUPTION.DESCRIPTION: Corruption, as defined in Article 3 of the Convention on the fight against corruption involving officials of the European Communities or officials of Member States of the European Union, OJ C 195, 25.6.1997, and in Article 2(1) of Council Framework Decision 2003/568/JHA of 22 July 2003 on combating corruption in the private sector (OJ L 192, 31.7.2003). This exclusion ground also includes corruption as defined in the national law of the contracting authority (contracting entity) or the economic operator
CORRUPTION.SUB-DESCRIPTION: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 36/2023 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes committed or attempted referred to in Articles 317, 318, 319, 319-ter, 319-quater, 320, 321, 322, 322-bis, 346-bis, 353, 353-bis, 354, 355 e 356 of the Penal Code or in Article 2635 of the Civil Code? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 36/2023 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

FRAUD.TITLE: Fraud
FRAUD.DESCRIPTION: Fraud within the meaning of Article 1 of the Convention on the protection of the European Communities' financial interests (OJ C 316, 27.11.1995)
FRAUD.SUB-DESCRIPTION: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 36/2023 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for froud crime as defined in Article 1 of the Convention on the protection of the European Communities' financial interests? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 36/2023 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

TERRORIST-OFFENCES.TITLE: Terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities
TERRORIST-OFFENCES.DESCRIPTION: Terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities, as defined in Articles 1 and 3 of Council Framework Decision of 13 June 2002 on combating terrorism (OJ L 164, 22.6.2002). This exclusion ground also includes inciting or aiding or abetting or attempting to commit an offence, as referred to in Article 4 of that Framework Decision
TERRORIST-OFFENCES.SUB-DESCRIPTION: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 36/2023 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes, committed or attempted, in connection with terrorism, even internationally, or subversion of constitutional order, terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 36/2023 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

MONEY-LAUNDERING.TITLE: Money laundering or terrorist financing
MONEY-LAUNDERING.DESCRIPTION: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgement for money laundering or terrorist financing, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Article 1 of Directive 2005/60/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 October 2005 on the prevention of the use of the financial system for the purpose of money laundering and terrorist financing (OJ L 309, 25.11.2005, p. 15)
MONEY-LAUNDERING.SUB-DESCRIPTION: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 36/2023 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuanto to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes as defined in Article 648-bis, 648-ter e 648-ter.1 of the Penal Code, money laundering or terrorist financing, as defined in Article 1 of Legislative Decree No. 109/2007? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 36/2023 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

CHILD-LABOUR.TITLE: Child labour and other forms of trafficking in human beings
CHILD-LABOUR.DESCRIPTION: Money laundering or terrorist financing, as defined in Article 2 of Directive 2011/36/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 5 April 2011 on preventing and combating trafficking in human beings and protecting its victims, and replacing Council Framework Decision 2002/629/JHA (OJ L 101, 15.4.2011)
CHILD-LABOUR.SUB-DESCRIPTION: Has any person of the economic operator listed in Article 80, paragraph 3, of the Legislative Decree no. 36/2023 been convicted by a sentence that has the force of res judicata, or by a criminal order against which no appeal lies, or by a sentence of application of punishment upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure, for crimes of exploitation of child labor and other forms of trafficking in human beings defined by the Legislative Decree n. 24/2014? (The economic operator does not have to declare the conviction if: the exclusion period set out directly in the judgment or in the decree or provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10 and 10-bis of the Legislative Decree No. 36/2023 is ended; the offence was decriminalised; the rehabilitation has been deemed to have occurred; the permanent accessory penalty has been deemed extinct provided for by Articolo 179, paragraph 7 of the Penal Code; the conviction was declared spent; the conviction has been overturned).

PAYMENT-SOCIAL-SECURITY.SUB-DESCRIPTION: Has the economic operator breached the obligations relating to the payment of taxes and duties, according to the Italian legislation or the legislation of the State of estabilishment?

EARLY-TERMINATION.TITLE: Early termination, damages or other comparable sanctions

EG-MISINTERPRETATION.TITLE: Guilty of misinterpretation, withheld information, unable to provide required documents and obtained confidential information of this procedure
EG-MISINTERPRETATION.DESCRIPTION: Can the economic operator confirm that it has not been guilty of serious misrepresentation in supplying the information required for the verification of the absence of grounds for exclusion or the fulfilment of the selection criteria, it has not withheld such information, it has been able, without delay, to submit the supporting documents required by a contracting authority or contracting entity, and it has not undertaken to unduly influence the decision making process of the contracting authority or contracting entity, to obtain confidential information that may confer upon it undue advantages in the procurement procedure or to negligently provide misleading information that may have a material influence on decisions concerning exclusion, selection or award?
EG-MISINTERPRETATION.SUB-DESCRIPTION: Has the economic operator attempted to unduly influence the decision making process of the contracting authority or to obtain confidential information that may confer upon it undue advantages in the procurement procedure, has it negligently provided false or misleading information that may have a material influence on decisions concerning exclusion, selection or award, has it withheld information need to a sound procurement procedure? The economic operator does not have to declare the breached if the exclusion period provided for by Article 80, paragraph 10-bis of Legislative Decree no. 50/2016 has expired.

The economic operator is not required to declare the sentence if: the exclusion period established by the sentence or decree or provided for by art. 80, co. 10 and 10-bis of Legislative Decree no. 50/2016; the offense was decriminalized; rehabilitation took place; the perpetual accessory penalty has been declared extinct pursuant to Article 179, seventh paragraph, of the Criminal Code; the offense was declared extinct after the conviction; the sentence was revoked. (Article 80, paragraph 1, letter b-bis), Legislative Decree no. 50/2016) Convictions involving prohibitions on contracting with the public administration - The subjects of the economic operator listed in art. 80, co. 3, of the legislative decree n. 50/2016 were sentenced with a definitive sentence or criminal decree which has become irrevocable or sentence applying the penalty upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure for any other crime from which, as an ancillary penalty, the incapacity to negotiate with the public administration? The economic operator is not required to declare the sentence if: the exclusion period established by the sentence or decree has ended; the offense was decriminalized; rehabilitation took place; the perpetual accessory penalty has been declared extinct pursuant to Article 179, seventh paragraph, of the Criminal Code; the offense was declared extinct after the conviction; the sentence was revoked. (Article 80, paragraph 1, letter g), Legislative Decree no. 50/2016)
EG-PURELY-NATIONAL.QUESTION2: False corporate communications - The subjects of the economic operator listed in art. 80, co. 3, of the legislative decree n. 50/2016 were sentenced with a definitive sentence or criminal decree of conviction that has become irrevocable or sentence applying the penalty upon request pursuant to article 444 of the Criminal Procedure Code for the crimes of false corporate communications referred to in articles 2621 and 2622 of Civil Code? The economic operator is not required to declare the sentence if: the exclusion period established by the sentence or decree or provided for by art. 80, co. 10 and 10-bis of Legislative Decree no. 50/2016; the offense was decriminalized; rehabilitation took place; the perpetual accessory penalty has been declared extinct pursuant to Article 179, seventh paragraph, of the Criminal Code; the offense was declared extinct after the conviction; the sentence was revoked. (Article 80, paragraph 1, letter b-bis), Legislative Decree no. 50/2016) Convictions involving prohibitions on contracting with the public administration - The subjects of the economic operator listed in art. 80, co. 3, of the legislative decree n. 50/2016 were sentenced with a definitive sentence or criminal decree which has become irrevocable or sentence applying the penalty upon request pursuant to Article 444 of the Code of Criminal Procedure for any other crime from which, as an ancillary penalty, the incapacity to negotiate with the public administration? The economic operator is not required to declare the sentence if: the exclusion period established by the sentence or decree has ended; the offense was decriminalized; rehabilitation took place; the perpetual accessory penalty has been declared extinct pursuant to Article 179, seventh paragraph, of the Criminal Code; the offense was declared extinct after the conviction; the sentence was revoked. (Article 80, paragraph 1, letter g), Legislative Decree no. 50/2016)
EG-PURELY-NATIONAL.QUESTION3: 1) They exist for the subjects referred to in art. 80, paragraph 3, of the Code causes of forfeiture, suspension or prohibition provided for in article 67 of Legislative Decree 6 September 2011, n. 159, or of an attempt of mafia infiltration referred to in Article 84, paragraph 4, of the same decree (Article 80, paragraph 2, of the Code)? The economic operator is not required to declare the cause of exclusion if a provision has been adopted that provides for the judicial administration provided for in Article 34 of Legislative Decree 159/2011 or the judicial control provided for by art. 34-bis, paragraph 6, of the same decree
EG-PURELY-NATIONAL.QUESTION4: 2) t has been subject to the interdictory sanction referred to in article 9, paragraph 2, letter c) of the legislative decree 8 June 2001, n. 231 or another sanction that involves the prohibition of contracting with the public administration, including the disqualification provisions referred to in Article 14 of Legislative Decree 9 April 2008, n. 81 (Article 80, paragraph 5, letter f);
EG-PURELY-NATIONAL.QUESTION5: 6) Has violated the rules governing the right to work of disabled persons as per law 12 March 1999, n. 68 (Article 80, paragraph 5, letter i); The economic operator is not required to declare the violation if the exclusion period provided for by art. 80, co. 10-bis of Legislative Decree no. 50/2016.

START_PAGE.TEXT: The Single European Tendering Document (ESPD) is a self-declaration by the company on its financial situation, its capabilities and its suitability for a public procurement procedure. Thanks to the ESPD, bidders no longer have to provide full documentary evidence and resort to the different forms previously used in EU procurement, which constitutes a significant simplification of access to cross-border procurement. Starting from October 2018, the ESPD is provided exclusively in electronic form. Tenderers may be excluded from the procurement procedure or prosecuted if seriously false, omitted or unsubstantiated information is presented in the ESPD by supporting documents.
